/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by lush green trees on one side and a row of buildings on the other. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the vast expanse. A few cars and buses can be seen traversing the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static landscape. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
